nodes.text: R4-B11 was a R4-series agromech droid owned by Slythor the Squib sometime after the Battle of Yavin. He was known to be cranky and destructive.

The droid's owner soon got tired of its inability to handle simple tasks and had the droid disassembled and rebuilt as an assassin droid. The unit's familiar appearance as an agromech droid allowed it to get close to its targets. Slythor often included the droid in trades whenever he wanted to recover what he gave away. After the unit was traded, it would kill its new owners and return to Slythor, who would recover the other objects that he wanted.
